title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2166.1 - Preliminary funding approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2166.1 - Preliminary funding approval

State Regulations

After responses to the request for proposals are received, the corporation will, on an ongoing basis, select the proposals which, within
the available funds, best meet the selection criteria set forth in section
2165.1
of this Title, and will, on
an ongoing basis, announce the names and the amounts of the grants to be
awarded to the selected eligible applicants after each meeting of the members
of the corporation at which any such awards are made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2166.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
